sections.heading: 01|Performance standard definitions
sections.text: Effective:October 3, 2023Latest Legislation:House Bill 33 - 135th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter:(A) "Performance index score" means the average of the totals derived from calculations, for each subject area, of the weighted

sections.heading: the Revised Code and any action taken under these sections do not abrogate any provision of a collective bargaining agreement in effect under Chapter 4117
sections.text: of the Revised Code and do not relieve any school district of the duty to comply with any provision of Chapter 4117. of the Revised Code.
